channel.title: Editing Item Stats (Matrix Base 718)
channel.description:
im working with a matrix base. and i have found some stats to be wrong in comparison to the Real Stats. How do i edit these on a 718+ server?
i found something about Item.CFG but i dont have one.
Edit #### Okay i figured it out. If anyone else is looking to do this and need help. Msg me =) ####
